name: Cabin Fever (Rui Caldeira)
description:
Assets Used - 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/snaps-prototype-sci...

MADE IN UNITY

In this game, one player is the human and the other player is the AI Core that runs the testing facility they are in. The puzzle the human must complete to escape the facility is clicking the correct buttons when prompted, but only the AI Core knows which buttons the human needs to press and where they are located.
